body:
Hello @svenharris! Thanks for updating the PR.

 - In the file [`pandas/core/reshape/merge.py`](https://github.com/svenharris/pandas/blob/e954263fc7c9203e1e053bf3e00d11336e35c45f/pandas/core/reshape/merge.py), following                are the PEP8 issues :
> [Line 816:9](https://github.com/svenharris/pandas/blob/e954263fc7c9203e1e053bf3e00d11336e35c45f/pandas/core/reshape/merge.py#L816): [E731](https://duckduckgo.com/?q=pep8%20E731) do not assign a lambda expression, use a def
> [Line 817:9](https://github.com/svenharris/pandas/blob/e954263fc7c9203e1e053bf3e00d11336e35c45f/pandas/core/reshape/merge.py#L817): [E731](https://duckduckgo.com/?q=pep8%20E731) do not assign a lambda expression, use a def
> [Line 1470:9](https://github.com/svenharris/pandas/blob/e954263fc7c9203e1e053bf3e00d11336e35c45f/pandas/core/reshape/merge.py#L1470): [E731](https://duckduckgo.com/?q=pep8%20E731) do not assign a lambda expression, use a def
> [Line 1617:5](https://github.com/svenharris/pandas/blob/e954263fc7c9203e1e053bf3e00d11336e35c45f/pandas/core/reshape/merge.py#L1617): [E731](https://duckduckgo.com/?q=pep8%20E731) do not assign a lambda expression, use a def


 - In the file [`pandas/tests/reshape/merge/test_merge_asof.py`](https://github.com/svenharris/pandas/blob/e954263fc7c9203e1e053bf3e00d11336e35c45f/pandas/tests/reshape/merge/test_merge_asof.py), following                are the PEP8 issues :
> [Line 439:9](https://github.com/svenharris/pandas/blob/e954263fc7c9203e1e053bf3e00d11336e35c45f/pandas/tests/reshape/merge/test_merge_asof.py#L439): [E731](https://duckduckgo.com/?q=pep8%20E731) do not assign a lambda expression, use a def




##### Comment last updated on October 16, 2018 at 20:11 Hours UTC
Not sure why the pep8 speaks is flagging lines that weren't updated in this PR, I think I may have messed up the git history somewhere
